item.title: Routing Cloud Firestore events to GKE with Eventarc
item.description: Google announced Firestore … integration with Eventarc. Ackal uses Firestore to persist Customer and Check information and it uses Google Cloud Firestore Triggers to handle events on these document types. Eventarc feels like the strategic future of eventing in Google Cloud and I’ve been concerned since adopting the technology that Google would abandon Google Cloud Firestore Triggers. For this reason, when I saw last week’s announcement, I thought I should evaluate the mechanism and this blog post is a summary of that work.
